document_data.mainbody:
Vance Carrathal was High King of Callidyrr in the midâ€“13 century DR. Like his predecessors, although he held the title of High King of the Moonshae Isles, he was considered to be merely a figurehead by the Ffolk outside of Callidyrr.
He was a member of the Carrathal Dynasty and was the first son of his predecessor, King Cedric. His eventual successor was his own son, Teldin.
Vance assumed the throne in the , after the death of his father. He ruled for twenty-three years before he died of natural causes in the .
